interface.name: com_deepin_client_management
interface.description: This interface enables clients to get properties of all windows shown on screen via the server. The server registers one clientmanagement object as a global object.

request.name: get_window_states

description.summary: request get the window state of all clients

request.description: request window state of all clients, will notify by "windows_state" event.

description.summary: get special window information for all clients

request.name: get_window_from_point
request.description: Request window id at the position where cursor pointed.

event.name: window_from_point
event.description: Window id at the position where cursor pointed.

request.name: get_all_window_id
request.description: Request window id of all clients, will notify by "all_window_id" event.
